title: David Shows Kindness to Mephibosheth
summary: David seeks to honor Jonathan’s memory by showing kindness to Mephibosheth, his disabled son. David restores Saul’s land to him and invites Mephibosheth to eat at the king’s table permanently.

faq.question: Who was Mephibosheth?
faq.answer: Jonathan’s son and Saul’s grandson, who was crippled in both feet.

faq.question: What kindness did David show him?
faq.answer: He gave him Saul’s land and a permanent place at the king’s table.
